Sentencas: Among solid oxides exploited to prepare efficient fuel cells, La1-xSrxMnO3 manganites have been widely studied and used as cathodes, because of their high conductivity at the working temperatures, good thermal stability and compatibility with other cell components.
Titulo: SIMS characterization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: A fundamental goal in solid oxide fuel cells technology consists in lowering the normal operating temperatures, e.g. increasing the surface/volume ratio of electrodic materials, so as to enhance their catalytic performances.
Titulo: SIMS characterization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: In this work, the preparation of high surface area La1-xSrxMnO3 (x approximate to 0.3) films on silicon wafers by the nitrate-citrate Pechini process is described.
Titulo: SIMS characterization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The films were characterized by X-ray diffraction, Atomic Force Microscopy and Secondary Ion Mass Spectrometry.
Titulo: SIMS characterization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Good quality nanostructured perovskite-type films were obtained.
Titulo: SIMS characterization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: SIMS methodology enabled to show the surface and in-depth coatings composition and residual contaminants.
Titulo: SIMS characterization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Moreover, it allowed defining the best synthesis conditions for complete in-depth decomposition of precursors and obtaining homogeneously thick coatings.
Titulo: SIMS characterization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 films for solid oxide fuel cell applications
